DOC.brief_summary: Acute kidney injury common complication cardiac surgery cardiopulmonary bypass ( CPB ) . This study aim investigate effect CPB renal perfusion , filtration oxygenation .
DOC.brief_title: Renal Perfusion , Filtration Oxygenation During Cardiopulmonary Bypass ( CPB )
DOC.detailed_description: After approval regional ethic committee , patient ( n=16 ) undergoing combine cardiac surgery procedure normothermic CPB include informed consent . Systemic renal variable measure pulmonary artery renal vein catheter . Glomerular filtration rate ( GFR ) measure renal extraction 51Cr-EDTA renal blood flow ( RBF ) infusion clearance technique para-aminohippuric acid ( PAH ) correct renal extraction PAH . Repeated measure ANOVA follow Fisher 's PLSD post-hoc test use statistical analysis
DOC.criteria: Preserved leave ventricular function ( LVEF > 50 % ) Normal preoperative Screatinine Contraindications radiocontrast Cardiac transplantation och dissection
